control.description-key: Hitachi Solutions PCF implementation of GOV.UK Design System Date component.

property.name: heading
property.description-key: What is the date you intend to capture?

property.name: fieldIdentifierErrorMessage
property.description-key: Provide error message specific text (eg [whatever it is]), for example: ‘Enter [whatever it is]’: ‘Enter your date of birth’

property.name: hint
property.description-key: Make sure that any example dates you use in hint text are valid for the question being asked

property.name: uniqueIdentifier
property.description-key: Unique idenfier for this fields control on form. Unless same field is present more than once on the form, use the field logical name. Only use lowercase letters and underscores.
